turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi could you tell me how much a large coffee is at Starbucks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What location would you like to order that from

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on Route 33 in Hamilton Square NJ

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok Sure! A regular large coffee is 6.00

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like to place an order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I would like a large black and white mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok I can place that order

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks, how long will it be?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: About 15 to 20 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do they deliver?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No they do not.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, I will pick it up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, that is fine.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, you are number 28

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok thank you. it will take my 15 minutes to get there.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok it will be ready in 20 inutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok I will see you then.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thank you for your order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Wait , can I add a blueberry scone?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course, just one?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yes, just one and a croissant.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Chocolate is good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok Is that all?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes that is all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok we will see you in 20 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok see you then

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thanks for calling.
